releaseNotes: Added source banner, feedback button, and fixed a caching bug
Added info icons, and 'Add a Meeting'
Fixed a bug in modal scroll-locking
Added meeting details to feedback emails
Fixed: the 'Join Meeting' button would incorrectly show when the meeting ID & password were set, but the no join url was provided
Fixed: tapping the Zoom ID or Zoom password wouldn't copy to the clipboard correctly
Feedback email subject now contains meeting day/time in EST, instead of the user's timezone
Links now open in new tabs, when relevant (Thx to SruliE for the feedback)
